trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SEQ_00<tab>Xeerol Ja is excited to get juicing.

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SEQ_01<tab>Xeerol Ja has tasked you with creating cherimoya juice.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 170. Delivering items with a rating of 340 or more will earn greater rewards.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the cherimoya juice to Xeerol Ja. She tells you to continue familiarizing with the local agriculture while she considers her next concoction.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_TODO_00<tab>Deliver cherimoya juice to Xeerol Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_HALNARUK_000_000<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... What?
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_005<tab>For our first juice, I'd like to try mixing up a blend for my fellow Mamool Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_006<tab>Tuliyollal gets far more sunlight than our native lands, so we find ourselves prone to dry, itchy scales. It can be sheer torture some days!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_007<tab>Luckily, the cherimoya fruit harvested from Urqopacha may offer a solution. According to Pelupelu merchants, regular consumption does wonders for dry skin.

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_008<tab>The only complication is that, in appearance and texture, cherimoya very much resembles Mamool Ja scales. Hard to garner appetite for something that looks like a piece of your body.

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_009<tab>If it were any other fruit, I'd think to extract the liquid from within─but not only is most of cherimoya's flavor kept in its pulp, its nutrients are as well.

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_011<tab>Perhaps you can find a way around this conundrum, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? See if you can't make a cherimoya juice both healing and appetizing to Mamool Ja!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_100_011<tab>Now, I'm afraid I don't keep cherimoya on hand─the sight alone is enough to make me queasy─but I've seen it for sale in Bayside Bevy.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_012<tab>We'll be testing for flavor and efficacy both, so make a big batch if you can─six glasses or so. Thank you, and good luck!

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>You may now undertake deliveries for Xeerol Ja Juicecraft. By delivering the requested items to Xeerol Ja and raising yourself in her esteem, you can help her turn her failing business around.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>Items with a higher collectability will result in greater rewards upon delivery. Speak to Xeerol Ja to view the delivery list.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_HALNARUK_000_014<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Is juicymix done yet? Halnaruk is bored.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_015<tab>Delicious, nutritious cherimoya juice that Mamool Ja can not only stomach but delight in. I'm sure you'll come up with something!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_016<tab>Oooh, it smells so sweet! You've done excellent work.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_017<tab>This consistency...this <var 1A 02 /var>aroma<var 1A 01 /var>! Why, it's so sweet, I'm tempted to steal a sip right away!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SYSTEM_000_018<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Xeerol Ja's trust.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>Deliver the items Xeerol Ja needs, and deliver them often to improve the prospects of Xeerol Ja Juicecraft!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_020<tab>I think we have enough to begin our tasting. It all looks and smells marvelous, anyway.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_021<tab>As we fashioned this drink with Mamool Ja in mind, allow me to be the first to try it...
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_022<tab>Exquisite! Thick with the cherimoya's signature sweetness and aroma, yet utterly smooth in texture!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_023<tab>No one would ever guess this juice came from a fruit so wholly unappetizing in appearance...

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_024<tab>Yes, I can safely say that no Mamool Ja could find qualms with this beverage─I myself would happily drink it daily. And with its nutritional benefits, peeling scales may become a thing of the past!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_025<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you simply <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> tell me how you made this!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_026<tab>So that's the trick! I see... I'll pen a proper recipe later so I won't forget. Fortunately, it sounds like one that even I could manage.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_100_026<tab>Can I interest you in a glass, Halnaruk? I'd love to hear what Moblins think of cherimoya's flavor.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_HALNARUK_000_027<tab>Busytask is waiting, juicekeep. Halnaruk has no time for tastesipping.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_028<tab>Er...did I offend him?
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_029<tab>P-Pay me no mind, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Sometimes I get caught up thinking...well...I just wonder how I might have done better.
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_100_029<tab>I know I shouldn't pester him about it. The juice you made is just so lovely, I... <sigh>
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_030<tab>In any case, I'd say your prototype passes muster. Our menu has its first new item!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_031<tab>I'll have to peel a lot of cherimoya, but I will keep the happiness of my newly moisturized kin at the forefront of my mind!

TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_XEEROLJA_000_032<tab>I'll consider what sort of juice I'd like to make next, so perhaps you could familiarize yourself with our local agriculture in the meantime. And if you ever find yourself in need of a refreshing beverage, you know where to look!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Xeerol Ja is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Mamool Ja Moisturizer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA302_04983_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The next request will be available from Xeerol Ja upon reaching level 93 as an alchemist or culinarian.
